#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}
// Submit to Lab 2 : Attempt 2
int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  Log_info("Put: Started k=%s v=%s",k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  auto putCmd = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  uint64_t startIndexResponse = 0;
  uint64_t startTermResponse = 0;
  Log_info("Put: Executing Raft Server Start");
  bool raftStartResponse = GetRaftServer().Start(putCmd, &startIndexResponse, &startTermResponse);
  ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  ev->Wait(200000);

  if(raftStartResponse==false) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  if(mp2.find(to_string(oid))!=mp2.end()) {
    Log_info("Put: Returning KV_SUCCESS k=%s v=%s",k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else {


    Log_info("Put: Returning KV_TIMEOUT k=%s v=%s",k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */

  Log_info("Append: Started: oid=%llu k=%s v=%s",oid,k.c_str(), v.c_str());
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  auto appendCmd = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  uint64_t startIndexResponse = 0;
  uint64_t startTermResponse = 0;
  bool raftStartResponse = GetRaftServer().Start(appendCmd, &startIndexResponse, &startTermResponse);
  ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  ev->Wait(200000);

  if(raftStartResponse==false) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  if(mp2.find(to_string(oid))!=mp2.end()) {
    Log_info("Append: Returning KV_SUCCESS k=%s v=%s",k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else {


    Log_info("Append: Returning KV_TIMEOUT k=%s v=%s",k.c_str(), v.c_str());
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */

  Log_info("Get: Started: oid=%llu k=%s",oid,k.c_str());
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  auto getCmd = static_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);

  uint64_t startIndexResponse = -1;
  uint64_t startTermResponse = -1;
  bool raftStartResponse = GetRaftServer().Start(getCmd, &startIndexResponse, &startTermResponse);
  ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  ev->Wait(200000);

  if(mp1.find(k)!=mp1.end()) {
    *v = (mp1[k]);
    Log_info("Get: FoundKey for oid=%llu k=%s v=%s",oid,k.c_str(),mp1[k].c_str());
  }
  else {
    Log_info("Get: NOT_FoundKey for oid=%llu k=%s v=%s",oid,k.c_str());
  }
  if(raftStartResponse==false) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  if(mp2.find(to_string(oid))!=mp2.end()) {
    Log_info("Get: Returning KV_SUCCESS for oid=%llu k=%s",oid,k.c_str());
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else {
    Log_info("Append: Returning KV_TIMEOUT k=%s",k.c_str());
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto msmResponse = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string oid="NA";
  string opType="NA";
  string k="NA";
  string v="NA";
  if(msmResponse->data_.size()>0) {
    oid = msmResponse->data_[0];
  }
  if(msmResponse->data_.size()>1) {
    opType = msmResponse->data_[1];
  }
  if(msmResponse->data_.size()>2) {
    k = msmResponse->data_[2];
  }
  if(msmResponse->data_.size()>3) {
    v = msmResponse->data_[3];
  }
  Log_info("OnNext Commaned Called oid=%s opType=%s k=%s v=%s",oid.c_str(), opType.c_str(), k.c_str(), v.c_str());

  if(opType=="put") {
    mp1[k]=v;
    mp2[oid]="Done";
  }
  else if(opType=="append") {
    mp1[k]+=v;
    mp2[oid]="Done";
  }
  else if(opType=="get") {
    mp2[oid]="Done";
  }
  /* your code here */
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
